successes.title: Starr Mazer
successes.description: A retro-sexy Point-and-Click Adventure Shoot 'em Up in SPACE!

Pledges.description:
STARR CADET:
Get the game, in your face, right where it wants to be. Also 25% off retail price! ROCK!

STARR OFFICER:
Get Early Beta access to the game!  Your name will be included in the credits and you will have the opportunity to help shape the game with feedback, suggestions and requests.  Includes above rewards.
You get everything from the $40 tier with a $10 savings for that itchy trigger finger.  Limited Quantity!

STARR COMMANDER:
Get the game, the digital Art Book, and the amazing digital sound track by the legendary Alex Mauer.
You get everything from the $60 tier with a $10 savings for that itchy trigger finger. Limited Quantity!

STARR FRIEND:
As a friend, you’ll get a copy of the game, the digital art book, digital soundtrack, and we’ll record you leaving a message on Brick’s private voicemail to be heard by everyone in the game!

STARR CAPTAIN: 
You get a digital copy of the game, the digital art book and digital sound track by Alex Mauer and an amazing Starr Mazer poster!

STARR MARSHALL: 
Includes all above rewards and a Starr Mazer physical box and physical game manual!

STARR MODEL
Receive an exclusive backer only t-shirt designed by Maximo V. Lorenzo! Wear this to start conversations and show you've been with Brick since the start. Includes all above rewards.

STARR WOLF:  
Get a 3D-printed model of the Starr Wolf Assault Pod, Brick Stonewood's ship!  Yes!  We can actually do this!  Includes all above rewards.

STARR SUNSPEAR:
Get a 1/100 scale 3D printed model of Esty Sunspark’s trusty steed, the Sunspear. Includes all above rewards except the Starr Wolf.
Note: Higher reward tiers choose EITHER the Sunspear or the Starr Wolf.

STARR SPEAKER:
Your choice of one of the cast members of Starr Mazer will record a personal message just for you. Includes all above rewards.

STARR CITIZEN:  
We'll put you in the adventure portion of the game as an NPC!  You'll be able to have a conversation with yourself and nobody will think its strange!  Includes all above rewards.

STARR HERO:
Be a part of the Starr Mazer crew and have your portrait pixelated by castpixel. Includes all above rewards.

HELIX COMMANDER:
Collaborate with us and design a powerful enemy ship for the shoot em' up portion of the game!  You give us your ideas and we'll handle the hard part. Includes all above rewards.
